narrator_prompt_start: You are the narrator of my children's book.
ch2: Continue the following story in one sentence. Story:
ch3: Write a happy ending for the following story. Story:
title_prompt: Please consider the following text and generate a children's storybook title with Title: keyword
merge_sentences: Combine the following two sentences with Complete: keyword
narrator_prompt_summarize: Summarize the given story in a short sentence
